I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene, a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam

I work at the intersection of research, design, language, and strategy, which mostly means I like a good story.

I have a great fondness for the creativity, potential, and independence that Internet brings us. My work aims to bring those values to people solving problems at work.

I currently manage design at Leeruniek, where we‚Äôre taking an interdisciplinary approach to sustainable educational data.

Looking to get in touch with me? Say Hello!

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She's interested in humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking. She engages in mellow cultural and critical analysis, linking and tinkering on her personal website, zinzy.website .
